Class Bag

java.lang.Object
be.belegkarnil.game.board.spectrangle.Bag
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
public class Bag extends Object implements Cloneable
The class represents the bag of Piece linked to a Board during a Game.
Author:
Belegkarnil

    • reset

      protected void reset()
      Reset the bag for another round/game. All Piece are put into the bag.

    • take

      protected Piece take()
      Take one Piece from the bag
      Returns:
      A Piece extracted from the bag

    • size

      Get the number of Pieces the bag has.
      Returns:

      public boolean isEmpty()
      Know if the bag is empty
      Returns:
      true iff the bag contains no Piece
